00014 int modules::parser::TokeniseByWhiteSpace(const std::string& input, std::vector<std::string>& output){
00015     std::stringstream ss(input);
00016     std::string val;
00017     while(ss>>val) output.push_back(val);
00018     return output.size();
00019 }
00020 
00021 int modules::parser::TokeniseByDelimiter(const std::string& input, std::vector<std::string>& output, const char* delim){
00022     char line[modules::parser::max_line];
00023     strcpy(line,input.c_str());
00024     char* word = strtok(line,delim);
00025     while(word != NULL){ 
00026             //std::cout<<"ModulesOptions:GetVectorStringsByDelimiter() "<<word<<std::endl;
00027         output.push_back(word);
00028         word = strtok(NULL,delim);
00029     }
00030     return output.size();
00031 }

00033 std::string modules::parser::GetOneWord(const std::string& in, size_t start, size_t stop){
00034         std::stringstream ss(in.substr(start,stop-start));
00035         std::string word;
00036         ss>>word;
00037         return word;
00038 }

00040 
00041 modules::parser::Constructor_t modules::parser::ParseConstructor(const std::string& input, char open, char close)
00042                 throw(modules::parser::errors::unmatched_parenthesis){
00043     size_t end_br=std::string::npos;
00044     size_t start_br=input.find(open);
00045     Constructor_t retVal;
00046     // cut out the string before the first open character
00047     retVal.before=input.substr(0,start_br);
00048     // trim whitespace from the start and end of retVal.before string
00049     TrimWhiteSpaceBeforeAfter(retVal.before);
00050     // Look for the requested brackets
00051     if(start_br!=std::string::npos){
00052        end_br=input.rfind(close);
00053        if(end_br==std::string::npos){
00054                // No matching close, although there was an open
00055                throw modules::parser::errors::unmatched_parenthesis(open,close);
00056        }
00057        retVal.inside=input.substr(start_br+1,end_br-start_br-1);
00058        TrimWhiteSpaceBeforeAfter(retVal.inside);
00059     }
00060     return retVal;
00061 }

00063 size_t modules::parser::RemoveWhitespace(std::string& input){
00064         return RemoveWhitespace(input, input.begin(),input.end());
00065 }
00066 
00067 size_t modules::parser::RemoveWhitespace(std::string& input, std::string::iterator start,std::string::iterator end){
00068         std::string::iterator new_end=std::remove_if(start,end,modules::parser::IsWhitespace);
00069         input.erase(new_end,end);
00070         return input.size();
00071 }
00072 
00073 void modules::parser::TrimWhiteSpaceBeforeAfter(std::string& line){
00074         size_t not_white=line.find_first_not_of(" \t");
00075         if(not_white!=std::string::npos)
00076            RemoveWhitespace(line, line.begin(),line.begin()+not_white+1);
00077 
00078         not_white=line.find_last_not_of(" \t");
00079         if(not_white!=std::string::npos)
00080            RemoveWhitespace(line, line.begin()+not_white+1,line.end());
00081 }

00083 bool modules::parser::IsWhitespace(char in){
00084         bool retval=false;
00085         switch(in){
00086                 case ' ': case '\t':
00087                         retval=true;
00088                         break;
00089                 default:
00090                         retval=false;
00091         }
00092         return retval;
00093 }

00095 bool modules::parser::IsDigit(char in){
00096         bool retval=false;
00097         switch(in){
00098                 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00099                 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00100                         retval=true;
00101         }
00102         return retval;
00103 }

00109 bool modules::parser::IsFloatChar(char in){
00110         return IsDecimal(in) || IsDigit(in);

00117 bool modules::parser::IsNumber(const std::string& input){
00118         return std::find_if(input.begin(),input.end(),IsNotFloatChar) == input.end();
00119 }

00121 int modules::parser::GetNumber(const std::string& input){
00122         int val;
00123         sscanf ( input.c_str(), "%d", &val );
00124         return val;
00125 }

00127 double modules::parser::GetDouble(const std::string& input, size_t start, size_t stop){
00128         TString tstr=input.substr(start,stop-start);
00129         double value=tstr.Atof();
00130         return value;

00133 bool modules::parser::iequals(const char a, const char b){
00134     return ( a=='_' && b=='-' ) ||
00135            ( a=='-' && b=='_' ) ||
00136            ( tolower(a) == tolower(b));
00137 }
00138 
00139 bool modules::parser::iequals(const std::string& a, const std::string& b){
00140   unsigned int sz = a.size();
00141   if (b.size() != sz) return false;
00142   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sz; ++i){
00143       if (! iequals(a[i],b[i])) return false;
00144   }
00145   return true;
00146 }
